Country_code.description: The code representing the country where the Netflix subscription is located.

Country.description: The name of the country where the Netflix subscription is located.

Total Library Size.description: The total number of TV shows and movies available in the Netflix library for the specific country.

No. of TV Shows.description: The number of TV shows available in the Netflix library for the specific country.

No. of Movies.description: The number of movies available in the Netflix library for the specific country.

Cost Per Month - Basic ($).description: The monthly cost of a basic Netflix subscription in the specific country, in US dollars.

Cost Per Month - Standard ($).description: The monthly cost of a standard Netflix subscription in the specific country, in US dollars.

Cost Per Month - Premium ($).description: The monthly cost of a premium Netflix subscription in the specific country, in US dollars.
